Make sure your old iPodTouch is Jailbroken.

I suggest you find 

1)iPod2,1_whited00r441.ipsw - This is the old version of WhiteD00r. The new version SUCKS, bloat, etc. This version seems to work just fine and it is what I use.

2)Jailbreak your iPod Touch 2g

3)Use Cydia to install Sources (Read about how to do that). You can install Terminal, and a few other things to get Root access to your device to transfer files through WinSCP and Putty. No need to use iTunes.

4)Install Apple Mobile Device support (Rip it out of iTunes using 7zip) Optionally you can install Bonjour Service for some of these cracked apps to work such as Remote.


These apps cannot be found in the App Store if you are running iOS 3.1.3 and still using your old iPodTouch 2g. 
So I made a torrent to help people who are still using an old iPod. These apps are very Helpful.

All of these apps work. Do not complain if they don't. Read and Learn. Some of them might be registered to me, but go ahead use them anyway. I don't care.

Please Help Seed as I have very limited Bandwidth...If you have high bandwidth please take this and seed it for others.
